en.hero.title: Two Raccoons
en.hero.subtitle: Innovation in copywriting, audio and video
en.about.content.title: Creative Agency with an Unusual Perspective
en.about.content.text: We¬¥re Two Raccoons where unstoppable creative ideas match with boundless results.
en.about.content.text2: Like our cute namesake, we're curious, adaptable, agile and always looking for innovative solutions, in line with our mission as a creative agency: to explore, adapt and connect.
en.about.content.text3: Raccoons are natural explorers, investigating and interacting with their surroundings. This reflects our endless curiosity and approach to seeking out new ideas, always exploring different angles, to bring about solutions in inventive ways, whether in voice over, translation/localization, design, copywriting, audio or video.
en.about.content.text4: Plus, of course, there are Two of us: the creative duality of founders who unite different perspectives and skills to create through authenticity, synergy, adventurous spirit and connection, delivering results for those looking for unconventional solutions and high-end work.
